articles.title: Trident share price rises 3% on European patent - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: The patent will help Trident to deliver soft towels without using chemical-based fibres, the company has said.
articles.content:
Trident share price rose over 3 percent intraday on January 15 after the company was granted a patent for Fabric and Method of manufacturing by the European Patent Office.
